pullRequest.title: feat(ProjectUI):Add Clearing Request button in project Details page
pullRequest.bodyText:
Signed-off-by: Abdul Kapti abdul.mannankapti@siemens.com

Please provide a summary of your changes here.


Enable Create Clearing Request button under Clearing Status tab of project details view.

Issue: #875
Suggest Reviewer

You can suggest reviewers here with an @mention.

How To Test?

User should be able to create/view the Clearing Request from Clearing Status tab in project details page. (as shown in below screenshot)
Also, test that existing functionality of creating the Clearing Request from project list page is not impacted



Checklist
Must:

 All related issues are referenced in commit messages and in PR

Signed-off-by: Abdul Kapti <abdul.mannankapti@siemens.com>

nodes.bodyText: Instead of using jstl:if to hide a button. It can be used to add appropriate button . It will prevent presence of unused button hidded in UI
